Html: When the oxite will support the Asp.net mvc 2?
Unknown at this time.  Have you tried it yourself?  It might "just work".  Not sure if there are breaking changes or not.

I've tried.  There are a few breaking issues and I decided against trying to fix them since MVC 2 is still in preview.  Didn't want to waste some time on features that may or may not be there (or where method signatures may change etc).

 

Just be patient and wait until MVC 2 is a RC.
